message: Starting PHASE 2: Analyzing current coordination implementation to enhance peer visibility
Found the limitation: get_minimal_coordination_info only returns last 3 findings. Creating comprehensive version with all peer data.
Created get_comprehensive_coordination_info function that returns ALL findings and progress. Now updating update_agent_progress and report_agent_finding to use it.
Testing enhanced coordination - verifying agents now receive full peer visibility with all findings and progress updates

PHASE 2 COMPLETE: Enhanced coordination system now provides 4.3x more peer visibility. Test verified: 13 findings available vs 3 before. Agents can now see ALL peer discoveries and coordinate effectively.
